headline.0: The Butcher's Bill in Gaza: Far Greater than Casualty Figures

short_description.0: In the widely-praised naval series by Patrick O'Brian, following each engagement, Captain Jack Aubrey would ask ship doctor Stephen Maturin "What is the butcher's bill"? The fictional hero wanted a casualty count.

authors.0: Carlos F. Torres, ContributorThe views of a citizen of the world
